, but this town with just over 8,000 inhabitants is a place of its own.

value: File:American Airpower Museum B-25 Miss Hap 03.JPG
The North American B-25 Mitchell, "Miss Hap," which was used to transport a General of the Army Air Corps during World War II, on display in the American Airpower Museum

The main roads in and out of here are the New York State routes
Nassau Inter-County Express operates a number of bus connections to Farmingdale.
The nearest airport is Republic Airport, which is literally just a few miles east of the village.

value: : Exit 49 South [Amityville] to Rte 110 South. 110 South to Conklin. Left on Conklin to New Highway. Right on New Highway until you see Museum sign on hangar 3.
: Exit to Rte 110 North. 110 North to Conklin. Travel north from the Route 110 exit, make a right at Conklin Avenue following the Home Depot retail complex and make another right at New Highway.
: Exit 40 [Broad Hollow Road] to Rte 110 South. 110 South to Conklin. Left on Conklin to New Highway. Right on New Highway until you see Museum sign on hangar 3.
: Long Island Railway to Farmingdale Station. From Farmingdale by cab, 2 minutes to Republic Airport.
hours=Memorial Day to Labor Day: 10:30am-5pm; Labor Day to Memorial Day: 10:30am-4pm. Closed New Year's Day, Christmas Day, Thanksgiving and Easter Sunday
price=Adults: $10; Seniors (over 65) and veterans with proper ID: $8; Children 4-12: $5; Under 4 years old: Free

content=The museum has several historical military aircraft from the 1930s through the 1960s, and also two tanks and a machine gun. It is also possible for a membership donation of $320 to have a simulated experience of being involved in the D-Day landing in Normandy, as you are briefed as if you are about to take part in the mission and then flown on a C-47 that participated in the actual operation.

There's a fairly good choice when it comes to picking a place to eat. Most of the restaurants are on or just off Main Street.

value: content=In the former library, serves good martinis, extensive menu for lunch and dinner.
content=Pub with catering and live entertainment. Serves sandwiches, salads, hamburgers and such.
